original_text: While Israel stayed there, his son Reuben had sex with Bilhah. She was Israel's slave wife, and Israel heard what had happened.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 그 땅에 거주할 때에 르우벤이 가서 그 아버지의 첩 빌하와 동침하매 이스라엘이 이를 들었더라

sentences.original_text: his son Reuben had sex with Bilhah
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 르우벤이 빌하와 성관계를 맺었다

sentences.original_text: and Israel heard what had happened
